Module com.group25
Package com.group25

Class QuestionGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.group25.QuestionGenerator
public class QuestionGenerator extends Object
This class generates arithmetic questions with multiple-choice answers.
Author:
Adam Murdock Gale, Sameer Mehboob Bugti, Saad Meshaal Koker, Jesse Titus, Fahmid Abdullah

    • QuestionGenerator

      public QuestionGenerator(int difficulty, int[] range)
      Constructs a QuestionGenerator with specified difficulty and range.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The difficulty level of the questions.
      range - The range within which the numbers in questions will be generated.
